author: Reuters Editorial
title: Mondelez - Entered Into Revolving Credit Agreement For Credit Facility In Amount Of $1.5 Billion
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Mondelez International Inc:
* MONDELEZ - ON FEB 28, ENTERED INTO REVOLVING CREDIT AGREEMENT FOR 364-DAY SENIOR UNSECURED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY IN AMOUNT OF $1.5 BILLION
* MONDELEZ SAYS REVOLVING CREDIT AGREEMENT WILL TERMINATE ON FEBRUARY 27, 2019 - SEC FILING
* MONDELEZ - EXPECT TO USE REVOLVING CREDIT AGREEMENT FOR WORKING CAPITAL PURPOSES, COMMERCIAL PAPER PROGRAM Source text ( bit.ly/2t5D5LA ) (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
